Galaxy_tool_ids: ampvis2_alpha_diversity, ampvis2_boxplot, ampvis2_core, ampvis2_export_fasta, ampvis2_frequency, ampvis2_heatmap, ampvis2_load, ampvis2_merge_ampvis2, ampvis2_mergereplicates, ampvis2_octave, ampvis2_ordinate, ampvis2_otu_network, ampvis2_rankabundance, ampvis2_rarecurve, ampvis2_setmetadata, ampvis2_subset_samples, ampvis2_subset_taxa, ampvis2_timeseries, ampvis2_venn
bio.tool_description: ampvis2 is an R-package to conveniently visualise and analyse 16S rRNA amplicon data in different ways.
